```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Equation 2 Combined Industrial Concentration and Competition and Ceiling Breach Size
# The formula created for this code is made using the Mathematics in R Markdown. For more about Mathematics formatting in R Markdown, see my "Mathematics Formatting in R Markdown" file.
library(lme4)
load(file="..//Output//ln_CBre_15A.rdata")
library(stargazer)



if(!exists("ln_CBre_Cons_Comp_15A"))
  ln_CBre_Cons_Comp_15A <- lmer (data=def_breach,
                                 ln_CBre_Then_Year ~CompOffr+cl_def6_HHI_lag1+cl_def6_ratio_lag1+cl_def6_obl_lag1+cl_US6_avg_sal_lag1+
                                   cl_def3_HHI_lag1+cl_def3_ratio_lag1+
                                   cl_Ceil_Then_Year+ cl_Days+
                                   Veh+
                                   PricingFee+b_UCA+
                                   b_Intl +
                                   b_UCA:CompOffr+
                                   b_UCA:cl_def6_HHI_lag1+
                                   cl_US6_avg_sal_lag1:PricingFee+
                                   (1 | NAICS3/NAICS) + 
                                   (1 | Agency/Office),
                                 verbose=TRUE)
# summary(ln_CBre_Cons_Comp_15A)
  
```


$Estimated Log(y_i)~=~(α~+~α^{NAICS3}_{j[i]}~+~α^{NAICS6}_{k[i]}~+~α^{Agency}_{l[i]}~+~α^{Office}_{m[i]}~+~β_{1}cl\_def3\_HHI\_lag1_{i}~+$

$β_{2}cl\_def6\_HHI\_lag1_{i}~+~β_{3}Comp1Offr~+~β_{4}Comp2Offr~+~β_{5}Comp3–4Offr_{i}+~β_{6}Comp5plusOffr_{i}~+$

$β_{7}cl\_def3\_ratio\_lag1_{i}~+~β_8cl\_def6\_obl\_lag1_{i}~+~β_9cl\_def6\_ratio\_lag1_{i}+~β_{10}cl\_US6\_avg\_sal\_lag1_{i}~+$

$β_{11}cl\_Ceil\_Then\_Year_{i}~+~β_{12}cl\_Days_{i}~+~β_{13}SIDC_{i}~+~β_{14}MIDV_{i}+~β_{15}FSS–GWAC_{i}+~β_{16}BPA–BOA_{i}~+$

$β_{17}Other\_FP_{i}~+~β_{18}Incentive_{i}~+~β_{19}Comb–Other_{i}~+~β_{20}Other\_CB_{i}~+~β_{21}TM–LH–FPLOE_{i}~+$

$β_{22}b\_UCA_{i}~+~β_{23}b\_Intl_{i}~+~β_{24}cl\_def6\_HHI\_lag1_{i}·b\_UCA_{i}~+~β_{25}Comp1Offr_{i}·b\_UCA_{i}~+$

$β_{26}Comp2Offr_{i}·b\_UCA_{i}~+~β_{27}Comp3–4Offr_{i}·b\_UCA_{i}+~β_{28}Comp5plusOffr_{i}·b\_UCA_{i}~+$

$β_{29}cl\_US6\_avg\_sal\_lag1_{i}·Other\_FP_{i}~+~β_{30}cl\_US6\_avg\_sal\_lag1_{i}·Incentive_{i}~+$

$β_{31}cl\_US6\_avg\_sal\_lag1_{i}·Comb–Other_{i}~+~β_{32}cl\_US6\_avg\_sal\_lag1_{i}·Other\_CB_{i}~+$

$β_{33}cl\_US6\_avg\_sal\_lag1_{i}·TM–LH–FPLOE_{i}~+~ε_{i},~for~i=  1~to~83,706$

$$a^{NAICS3}_{j}\sim~N(μ_{α},σ^{2}_{α}),~for~j= 1~to~80;~~a^{NAICS6:NAICS3}_{k}\sim~N(μ_{α},σ^{2}_{α}),~for~k= 1~to~813$$
$$a^{Agency}_{l}\sim~N(μ_{α},σ^{2}_{α}),~~for~l= 1~to~24;~~a^{Office:Agency}_{m}\sim~N(μ_{α},σ^{2}_{α}),~~for~m= 1~to~880$$
